nodes.text: The Credit coffer was a kind of vault used by the InterGalactic Banking Clan on Cybloc Transfer Station around 21 BBY.

When the Sith Lord Darth Maul and his brother/apprentice Savage Opress attacked the station, and destroyed the droids guarding it, Savage found a coffer full of credits. Later it was offered to Jiro and several other Weequay pirates, in return for joining the brothers against Obi-Wan Kenobi, Hondo Ohnaka and his gang.
